abce.agency
Class AsyncDataSchedule

java.lang.Object
  sim.engine.Schedule
      abce.agency.AsyncDataSchedule
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AsyncDataSchedule
extends sim.engine.Schedule

This addition to the MASON scheduler tests whether Steppables also implement the AsyncUpdate interface. If they do, this schedule will call their update method after each step of the schedule has been completed. The MASON scheduler calls a protected function each time a public scheduleOnce...() function is called. Therefore, since we cannot override the generic function, we override each of these scheduleOnce...() functions. However, each of the public scheduleRepeating() functions also calls the public scheduleRepeating function which is overridden below. Therefore, the hook is only required once for that entire set of functions.

Author:
kkoning
See Also:
Serialized Form

See Also:
Constant Field Values

asyncUpdaters

protected java.util.Set<AsyncUpdate> asyncUpdaters
The set of agents which need to be updated asyncronously. This must be a set rather than a list/vector/array because updating an agent more than once would cause undesirable (inaccurate) behavior.
